basics.name: Run Wang
basics.summary: Research Assistant at Clemson University focusing on 3D Vision, Generative Models, and Trustworthy AI.

highlights: Assisted migration from legacy systems to newer technologies
Ensured data integrity and optimized SQL Server queries
Utilized stored procedures and query tuning techniques
Developed graph-based models to extract component-level information from engineering drawings using PyTorch
Achieved over 90% accuracy in component extraction
Collected 80+ Linux malware samples and traced dynamic system-level behaviors
Created an in-house database with 14 selected behavior features

research.company: RPI-IBM Cognitive and Immersive Systems Lab
highlights: Built a real-time gesture recognition system using C# and Python
Collected skeleton data from 600+ samples across diverse participants

education.summary: Concentration: 3D Vision, Generative Model, Trustworthy AI for AV

education.area: M.S. in Electrical and Computer Engineering

publications.name: MAPP: Predictive UI View Pre-caching for Improving the Responsiveness of Mobile Apps
Component Segmentation of Engineering Drawings Using Graph Convolutional Networks

projects.name: User Recommendation MicroService
projects.description: Built a user recommendation system using FastAPI, Vert.x, Spark Scala on AWS and GCP, achieving 10,000 RPS within a $0.7/hr budget.

projects.name: WeCloudChat Service
projects.description: Deployed RESTful Spring applications on GKE, managed scaling with HPA, and configured Azure Front Door for multi-cloud routing.

projects.name: Driver Matching System with Streaming Processing
projects.description: Implemented a real-time driver matching system and managed IoT streams with Samza API.
